info.name: auth
info.description:
user-service, "auth" route: User creation and authentication

Routes:
- POST /auth/register
- GET /auth/registrationConfirm
- POST /auth/signin

Variables:
- email: valid email address that can be used to recieve the confirmation email
- registrationToken: used to dynamically change the token that confirms the registration

item.name: /register
item.description:
POST /auth/register
Creation of a new user

item.name: /signin
item.description:
POST /auth/signin
Login with username and password
